parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake pedal can cause the vehicle to accelerate unexpectedly, leading to accidents, injuries, and damage to property.
symptoms: The brake pedal requires excessive pressure to depress
the vehicle accelerates unexpectedly
the vehicle lurches forward
the brake pedal fails to respond properly
especially when reversing.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Brake Vacuum Loss and Auto-Start/Stop System Malfunction
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The increased stopping distance during brake vacuum loss events can lead to accidents, and the auto-start/stop system malfunction can cause unexpected engine shutdowns and delays in resuming driving, increasing the risk of rear-end collisions.
symptoms: Increased stopping distance
check engine light is always on
engine shuts off at red lights and goes into neutral mode
lengthy delay and/or engine and transmission jolt after brake pedal is released
inability to pass emissions compliance testing due to persistent check engine light.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunction of the defroster/heater system can cause complete vision impairment, increasing the risk of accidents, especially when driving in cold weather conditions.
symptoms: Moisture accumulates on the windshield
obstructing the driver's view
even with the defroster on maximum setting; water drips down from the windshield when wiped; AC unit or heater throws moisture into the cabin; AC turns on by itself while driving.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The intermittent disappearance of guidelines on the reverse camera can cause distractions, increasing the risk of accidents or property damage while reversing.
symptoms: Guidelines on the reverse camera display disappear for no apparent reason; guidelines reappear when the car is put into neutral and then back into reverse; unreliable performance of the reverse camera system.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Unintended acceleration can cause accidents, injuries, and fatalities, especially when merging with traffic or navigating through tight spaces.
symptoms: The vehicle accelerates unexpectedly
hesitates to speed up
or surges forward when the brake pedal is depressed
leading to loss of control or crashes.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: A malfunctioning brake pedal can cause accidents, injuries, and fatalities, especially when the vehicle fails to stop or slows down unexpectedly.
symptoms: The brake pedal feels soft or spongy
the brake pedal does not respond properly
the vehicle accelerates unexpectedly when the brake pedal is depressed
the vehicle fails to stop or slows down unexpectedly.
